AUTO INSURANCE POLICY
Policy Number: AP-12345678

Named Insured: John Smith
Policy Period: 01/01/2023 to 01/01/2024

COVERAGES AND LIMITS:
Liability: $100,000 per person / $300,000 per accident
Property Damage: $50,000 per accident
Medical Payments: $5,000 per person
Uninsured Motorist: $100,000 per person / $300,000 per accident
Comprehensive: $500 deductible
Collision: $500 deductible

EXCLUSIONS:
Intentional damage, racing, business use unless declared.
